name: heavy stick
description: A sturdy, heavy stick.  Makes a decent melee weapon.

name: long stick
description: A long stick.  Makes a decent melee weapon, and can be broken into heavy sticks for crafting.

name: two by four
description: A plank of wood.  Makes a decent melee weapon, and can be used to board up doors and windows if you have a hammer and nails.

name: wooden panel
description: A wide, thin wooden board - plywood, MDF, or similar.  These large flat boards are good for all kinds of construction.
//: Weight assumes 1/2 inch thick 4x8 plywood sheet.  The displacement volume for a sheet like that is only 15L, I increased it due to sheer awkwardness.
